overview:
Steve Davis is the President of Author-it Software Corporation. In this position, he is responsible for the strategic and operational management of the company.

Following a successful career in the Royal New Zealand Navy, Steve spent nine years working with companies in New Zealand, Australia and the United States with an emphasis on business management, marketing, strategic planning, capital raising and international expansion.

Prior to joining Author-it Software Corporation, Steve held the role of Chief Marketing Officer with wireless systems integrator, ECONZ Wireless. At ECONZ Wireless, Steve was part of the senior management team and played a key role in developing and executing plans for the expansion of the company. This saw the company launch its products with Telecom New Zealand and raise venture capital to expand into the USA. Steve relocated to the US and worked to establish business operations, recruit staff and secure key partnerships with Qualcomm and Verizon Wireless.

Steve has a Master of Business Administration (MBA) from Griffith University, Queensland, a Bachelor of Engineering (BE) from the University of Auckland and is a Certified Developer of Enterprise.
